availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a real estate agent and served as a justice of the peace in Louisville.

Spouse: Mary A. Stephens
Children: Elizabeth Stephens, John H. Stephens, William J Stephens, Henry C Stephens, Robert J Stephens, Mary Stephens, Maria B Stephens, Amelia M Stephens, Walter C Stephens, Alpha Stephens

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson county, Louisville 4th ward, p. 96
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 2, page 182.
